Strawberries.description: Requires well-drained soil. High susceptibility to Botrytis cinerea in high humidity. Target pH 5.5-6.5.

Tomatoes.description: Monitor for Early Blight. Blossom End Rot risk if irrigation is inconsistent. Optimal night temp > 60°F.

Peppers.description: Sensitive to cold shock below 55°F. Thrives in stable warm conditions. Watch for Aphids.
